channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia, AMD, Apple and other tech titans must prove that AI investment is boosting earnings
item.description: Is Alphabet‚Äôs stock price drop ‚Äî partially due to rising AI costs (and little income) ‚Äî a sign of things to come?

item.title: Fast-food chains battle for low-income diners with summer value meals
item.description: McDonald's, Burger King and Taco Bell are among the fast-food chains with $5 value meals this summer.

item.title: Heineken shares fall 8% after first-half profit miss
item.description: Operting profit showed organic growth of 12.5%, below a company-compiled consensus forecast of 13.2%.

item.title: Occidental unveils $970 million worth of asset sales as it works to reduce debt
item.description: The Warren Buffett-backed company is selling about 27,500 net acres in the Barilla Draw Field of the Texas Delaware Basin and about 2,000 net acres in the New Mexico Delaware Basin, with combined net fourth-quarter production estimated at about 15,000 barrels of oil equivalent a day.

item.title: McDonald's earnings, revenue miss estimates as consumer pullback worsens
item.description: McDonald's stock has fallen 15% year to date, dragging its market value down to $181.2 billion.

item.title: McDonald's earnings, revenue miss estimates as consumer pullback worsens
item.description: McDonald's stock has fallen 15% year to date, dragging its market value down to $181.2 billion.

item.title: Some $6 trillion of funds are about to shift ‚Äî and here‚Äôs where they may end up
item.description: Strategists at UBS led by Matthew Mish say corporate debt will benefit when fund flows begin to shift.

item.title: Biden rolls out plan to overhaul the Supreme Court
item.description: The Supreme Court previously ruled that Donald Trump was immune from criminal prosecution for official acts he did as president.

item.title: Government, opposition both claim Venezuela election win, official results questioned
item.description: President Nicolas Maduro and his opposition rival Edmundo Gonzalez on Monday both claimed victory in Venezuela's presidential election.

item.title: Trump stops short of establishing a bitcoin strategic reserve
item.description: Donald Trump announced his bitcoin reserve proposal at his keynote speech at the Bitcoin Conference in Nashville.

item.title: European markets start the new trading week higher as earnings season continues
item.description: European markets were higher Monday as investors digest U.S. inflation data and look ahead to another busy week of earnings and central bank meetings.

item.title: Abbott Labs, Reckitt see further stock-price pressure after $495 million jury award
item.description: U.K. consumer-products giant Reckitt saw its share price slump after a jury awarded $495 million in a key baby-formula case.

item.title: Elon Musk retweets altered Kamala Harris campaign ad
item.description: In the video, Harris is seemingly exposing herself as an incompetent candidate for president. The origin of the video is not known at this time.

item.title: Philips shares jump 10.5% as second-quarter sales grow despite China weakness
item.description: Shares of Philips jumped in early deals Monday after the Dutch device maker reported better-than-expected second-quarter earnings.
